name: dropdown-menu
description: Displays a menu to the user

files.content:
<script setup lang="ts">
import { DropdownMenuRoot, type DropdownMenuRootProps } from 'reka-ui'

const props = defineProps<DropdownMenuRootProps>()
</script>

<template>
  <DropdownMenuRoot v-bind="props">
    <slot />
  </DropdownMenuRoot>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { DropdownMenuTrigger as DropdownMenuTriggerPrimitive } from 'reka-ui'
</script>

<template>
  <DropdownMenuTriggerPrimitive as-child>
    <slot />
  </DropdownMenuTriggerPrimitive>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { DropdownMenuPortal, DropdownMenuContent as DropdownMenuContentPrimitive } from 'reka-ui'
import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'

interface Props {
  class?: string
  sideOffset?: number
}

const props = withDefaults(defineProps<Props>(), {
  sideOffset: 4,
})
</script>

<template>
  <DropdownMenuPortal>
    <DropdownMenuContentPrimitive
      :side-offset="props.sideOffset"
      :class="
        cn(
          'z-50 min-w-[8rem] overflow-hidden border-3 border-foreground bg-popover p-1 text-popover-foreground shadow-[4px_4px_0px_hsl(var(--shadow-color))]',
          props.class
        )
      "
    >
      <slot />
    </DropdownMenuContentPrimitive>
  </DropdownMenuPortal>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { DropdownMenuItem as DropdownMenuItemPrimitive } from 'reka-ui'
import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'

defineProps<{
  class?: string
  inset?: boolean
  disabled?: boolean
}>()
</script>

<template>
  <DropdownMenuItemPrimitive
    :disabled="disabled"
    :class="
      cn(
        'relative flex cursor-default select-none items-center px-2 py-1.5 text-sm outline-none transition-all duration-150 focus:bg-accent focus:text-accent-foreground focus:translate-x-1 data-[disabled]:pointer-events-none data-[disabled]:opacity-50',
        inset && 'pl-8',
        $props.class
      )
    "
  >
    <slot />
  </DropdownMenuItemPrimitive>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { DropdownMenuLabel as DropdownMenuLabelPrimitive } from 'reka-ui'
import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'

defineProps<{
  class?: string
  inset?: boolean
}>()
</script>

<template>
  <DropdownMenuLabelPrimitive
    :class="
      cn(
        'px-2 py-1.5 text-sm font-bold uppercase tracking-wide',
        inset && 'pl-8',
        $props.class
      )
    "
  >
    <slot />
  </DropdownMenuLabelPrimitive>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { DropdownMenuSeparator as DropdownMenuSeparatorPrimitive } from 'reka-ui'
import { cn } from '@/lib/utils'

defineProps<{
  class?: string
}>()
</script>

<template>
  <DropdownMenuSeparatorPrimitive :class="cn('-mx-1 my-1 h-px bg-foreground', $props.class)" />
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { DropdownMenuRadioGroup as DropdownMenuRadioGroupPrimitive } from 'reka-ui'

defineProps<{
  modelValue?: string
}>()

const emit = defineEmits<{
  'update:modelValue': [value: string | null]
}>()
</script>

<template>
  <DropdownMenuRadioGroupPrimitive :model-value="modelValue" @update:model-value="(val) => emit('update:modelValue', val as string | null)">
    <slot />
  </DropdownMenuRadioGroupPrimitive>
</template>
